servicediscovery
Class ServiceDiscoveryLayer

java.lang.Object
  servicediscovery.ServiceDiscoveryLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
MulticastReceive
public class ServiceDiscoveryLayer
extends Object
implements MulticastReceive

this is the service discovery class. This class is the core of the service discovery layer. An object of this class is instanticted by each application. This class provides the api that the application uses. The service discovery uses the multicast layer class.

Author:
parth

public ServiceDiscoveryLayer(boolean bool,
                             boolean multicast)
the constructor initiaated an objecct of the service disvoery layer.

Parameters:
bool - boolean to enable/disable debug messages for this class
multicast - to enable disable debug messaged for the multicas layer
Method Detail

registerNewService

public String registerNewService(String serviceType)
this method will add a service to the service set of the SDL It will perform all the checks for a valid service that need to be done. returns a service id of the new service that has just been registered. this serviceid is used to refer to this particular service for any subsequent calls to other functions

Parameters:
service - the service type of the service being registered.
Returns:
returns a service id of the new service that has just been registered.

sendMessage

public void sendMessage(Message message)
this method generates a string from the message object and then passes it to the multicast layer reliable multicast layer.

Parameters:
message - the message object for the message to be sent

registerApp

public void registerApp(Object appObject)
this is used to register the application object. This application object is the object that is used to call Methods of the actions and the triggers that are registered by the application.

Parameters:
appObject - the object of the application class.

registerActions

public void registerActions(String serviceID,
                            String methodName,
                            String actionName,
                            Class appClass)
                     throws Exception
registers actions to a particular service.

Parameters:
serviceID - the service ID to which the action is to be register to.
methodName - the name of the method in the application class that is to be associatedd with the action.
actionName - the name of the action.
appClass - the class of the application.
Throws:
Exception - throws no such method exception.

addLocationValue

public void addLocationValue(String serviceId,
                             String home,
                             String floor,
                             String room,
                             String inRoom,
                             String userTag)
add the location value to the location property to a particular service specified by the service id The location property has to be added for that service before a call to this.

Parameters:
serviceId - the serviceid to which the location value has to be addded.
home - home name cannot be null
floor - floor name or 'notset'
room - room name or 'notset'
inRoom - inRoom location or 'notset'
userTag - user tag name or 'notset'

Returns:
the map whose key is property name and value is property object.
